[[inst_sd_and]]
==== SD.AND

*Syntax:* sd.and<.{rl, f, rlf}> [SrcL], SrcR

*Description:* Atomic And operation: memory value is atomically anded with register.

image::../generated/encodings/enc_sd_and.svg[SD.AND encoding,width=800]

*Group:* AMO/AMO
